actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 2031 of title 10, United States Code, to reduce the minimum number of students that must be in a Junior Reserve Officer Training Corps unit, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Revises Junior Reserve Officer Training Corps minimum enrollment provisions to require: (1) at least 50 enrollees at an institution of 1000 or more; or (2) at least five percent enrollees at smaller institution. Provides that such enrollees may be United States nationals (presently must be citizens). Authorizes the Secretary of the military department concerned to temporarily waive such requirements if an institution falls below the minimum enrollment requirements.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 2031 of title 10, United States Code, to reduce the minimum number of students that must be in a Junior Reserve Officer Training Corps unit, and for other purposes.
